# OCR Multi-Engine Module - Dependencies
# Layer: Extractor

# Core OCR engines
pytesseract>=0.3.10
Pillow>=10.0.0
PyMuPDF>=1.23.0  # For PDF processing (fitz)

# Cloud OCR providers
openai>=1.0.0
mistralai>=0.0.7

# Optional but recommended
requests>=2.31.0  # For direct API calls

# Image processing
# Pillow already listed above
